sourcesContent: import { Component, Output, EventEmitter } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'pg-admin'; isActive: boolean = false; isContentFullWidth: boolean = false; toggleSidebar() { this.isActive = !this.isActive; this.isContentFullWidth = !this.isActive; } }
